name: Ghosty!
description:
Guide Ghosty to the ghost house! A game made for Wowie Jam 3.0 over the course of two days.

(I realized toward the end that the levels were probably too frustrating again, and there also are some bugs. But I didn't have time to fix those things.)

Controls:

[Space] or LMB - Jump

[R] - Restart level

[Escape] or [Backspace] - Exit to main menu

Music:

Sugar Fairies  by Rafael Krux
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5429-sugar-fairies-
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
